definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Diana Sterling lived in the Back Bay, only half a mile from your residence.
sentences.chinese: 斯黛安住在巴克湾，离你的寓所不到一公里。

sentences.english: He took the elevator to his sixth-floor apartment.
sentences.chinese: 他乘电梯到了位于六层的寓所。

sentences.english: He occupies a three-story dwelling place on the Park Street.
sentences.chinese: 他在派克街上有一幢3层楼的寓所。

sentences.english: He took the elevator to his sixth-floor ____________.
sentences.chinese: 他乘电梯到了位于六层的寓所。

sentences.english: The apartment consisted of two small rooms and a parlor.
sentences.chinese: 他们的寓所包括两个小房间和一个套间。

sentences.english: He walked alone down the red-carpeted hallway toward the White House residence.
sentences.chinese: 沿着铺着红地毯的走廊，他独自一人走向了白宫寓所。

sentences.english: This lofty virtue had three domiciles in Paris for the sake of escaping from the police.
sentences.chinese: 这年高德劭的人在巴黎有三处寓所，为的是躲避警察。

sentences.english: Article 13. The residence of a consular officer shall be inviolable.
sentences.chinese: 第十三条领事官员的寓所不受侵犯。

sentences.english: Visiting his daughter's home, he added the loss left him "speechless".
sentences.chinese: 查看了女儿的寓所，他说痛失女儿令他“无言以对”。

sentences.english: If I can manage it, I enjoy the occasional day when I never step foot out of my apartment.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我很享受一步也不踏出寓所的日子。

sentences.english: In his eagerness to see his girlfriend, Jack burned up the road on his way to her apartment.
sentences.chinese: 杰克急于见女友，在去其寓所路上将车开得飞快。

sentences.english: Included was also the residence of Miles, which Dai Li had built for him.
sentences.chinese: 此外还有戴笠给梅乐斯建造的寓所。

sentences.english: We really proud that we can offer our British friends a recidence overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们为能够安排英国朋友在临海的寓所下榻感到骄傲。

sentences.english: My flat was in a big new building in Langham Place.
sentences.chinese: 我的寓所在兰厄姆一幢新大楼里。

sentences.english: I returned to my flat at about three o'clock on that May afternoon very unhappy with life.
sentences.chinese: 五月的那个下午三点来钟我回到寓所，过得很不开心。

definition: to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)
Gongguan or Kungkuan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
lit. to open a room/fig. to settle in a quiet room/behind closed doors
police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
